AT.name: Sonic Boom™: Lyrics Aufstieg
AT.description: In Sonic Boom™: Lyrics Aufstieg finden Sonic, Tails, Knuckles und Amy ein uraltes Grab tief im Innern einer Insel. Hier stoßen sie auf einen mächtigen Schlangenbösewicht namens Lyric, der letzte Vorzeitliche, der mit den Kristallen seine Armee von Robotern aktivieren und alles organische Leben zerstören möchte, um die Welt mit seinen Metallrobotern zu bevölkern. Die Freunde müssen ihre Unstimmigkeiten beiseite legen und zusammenarbeiten, um die Welt vor Lyric und seiner Horde unheilvoller Roboter zu bewahren! Ihre Reise führt sie durch uralte Ruinen, die Tiefen des Ozeans und sogar in die Vergangenheit... Dies könnte ihr bisher größtes Abenteuer sein! Hast du das Zeug, zusammen mit Sonic und seinen Freunden Lyric und die finsteren Roboter zu besiegen?

movies.name: Sonic Boom™: Lyrics Aufstieg - Trailer zum Verkaufsstart
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: englischsprachiger Trailer (E3 2014)

AU.name: Sonic Boom™: Rise Of Lyric
AU.description: In Sonic Boom™: Rise of Lyric, Sonic and his friends Tails, Knuckles and Amy encounter an ancient tomb sealed deep within an island, where they come across a powerful snake-like villain named Lyric the last Ancient, who plans to power his army of robots with the Crystals to destroy everything organic and to create a world of twisted metal robots. The group must put aside their differences and work together as a team to save the world from Lyric’s evil plan and his army of war mongering robots! They will race across ancient ruins, the depths of the ocean and even back in time... This may be their biggest adventure yet. Do you have what it takes to help Sonic and friends defeat the evil Lyric and his robot army?

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: Trailer (E3 2014)

BG.name: Sonic Boom™: Rise Of Lyric
BG.description: In Sonic Boom™: Rise of Lyric, Sonic and his friends Tails, Knuckles and Amy encounter an ancient tomb sealed deep within an island, where they come across a powerful snake-like villain named Lyric the last Ancient, who plans to power his army of robots with the Crystals to destroy everything organic and to create a world of twisted metal robots. The group must put aside their differences and work together as a team to save the world from Lyric’s evil plan and his army of war mongering robots! They will race across ancient ruins, the depths of the ocean and even back in time... This may be their biggest adventure yet. Do you have what it takes to help Sonic and friends defeat the evil Lyric and his robot army?

BE.name: Sonic Boom™: L'Ascension de Lyric
BE.description: Dans Sonic Boom™ : L'ascension de Lyric, Sonic et ses amis Tails, Knuckles et Amy découvrent une tombe ancienne scellée dans les entrailles d'une île. Ils y font la rencontre d'un puissant serpent maléfique, Lyric, le dernier des Anciens. Celui-ci prévoit d'utiliser les cristaux pour alimenter son armée de robots afin de détruire toute forme de vie et créer un monde de robots métalliques. La bande doit unir ses forces et former une équipe soudée pour sauver le monde et contrer les plans diaboliques de Lyric et de son armée de robots guerriers! Ils devront aller à toute vitesse dans des ruines anciennes, dans les abysses, et même dans le passé... Cette aventure pourrait être leur plus extraordinaire. As-tu le courage d'aider Sonic et ses amis pour vaincre le cruel Lyric et son armée robotique ?

movies.name: Sonic Boom™: L'Ascension de Lyric - bande-annonce de lancement
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric : bande-annonce en anglais (E3 2014)

ES.name: Sonic Boom™: El Ascenso de Lyric
ES.description: En Sonic Boom™: El Ascenso de Lyric, Sonic y sus amigos Tails, Knuckles y Amy descubren una antigua tumba en las profundidades de una isla. Allí se topan con un poderoso villano con forma de serpiente. Se llama Lyric y planea dar vida a su ejército de robots con los cristales a fin de destruir toda vida orgánica y crear un mundo a base de robots metálicos. ¡La pandilla deberá trabajar en equipo para salvar al mundo del malvado Lyric y su ejército de belicosos robots! Correrán por ruinas antiguas, explorarán las profundidades del océano y viajarán al pasado... Quizás su mayor aventura hasta el momento. ¿Serás capaz de ayudar a Sonic y a sus amigos a derrotar al malvado Lyric y su ejército de robots?

movies.name: Sonic Boom: El Ascenso de Lyric - Tráiler de lanzamiento
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: Tráiler en inglés (E3 2014)

IT.name: Sonic Boom™: L'ascesa di Lyric
IT.description: In Sonic Boom™: L’ascesa di Lyric, Sonic e i suoi amici Tails, Knuckles ed Amy si imbattono in un’antica tomba, sepolta nel cuore di un’isola, da cui viene liberato Lyric, l’ultimo Saggio, potente e malvagio rettile che, grazie al proprio potente esercito di robot e al potere dei cristalli, sogna di distruggere tutte le creature viventi e creare un modo abitato soltanto da perfidi robot. I quattro amici dovranno mettere da parte le proprie divergenze e collaborare come una squadra per salvare il mondo dai piani malvagi di Lyric e del suo esercito di bellicosi robot! Dovranno correre tra antiche rovine, esplorare le profondità dell’oceano e perfino tornare indietro nel tempo... È forse la loro avventura più impegnativa. Sarai in grado di aiutare Sonic e i suoi amici a sconfiggere quello scellerato di Lyric e il suo esercito robotico?

movies.name: Sonic Boom™: L'ascesa di Lyric - trailer di lancio
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: trailer in inglese (E3 2014)

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric - Launch Trailer
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: Trailer (E3 2014)

NL.name: Sonic Boom™: Rise Of Lyric
NL.description: In Sonic Boom™: Rise of Lyric vinden Sonic en zijn vrienden Tails, Knuckles en Amy een oude tombe, diep onder de grond op een eiland. Op dat eiland lopen ze ook een machtige, slangachtige schurk tegen het lijf, Lyric the last Ancient genaamd. Lyric wil de kristallen gebruiken om zijn robotleger te versterken, al het organisch leven uit te roeien en een wereld vol maffe metalen robots te scheppen. De groep vrienden moeten hun meningsverschillen achter zich laten en als team samenwerken om de wereld te redden van het snode plan en oorlogszuchtige robots van Lyric. Ze snellen door oude ruïnes, de diepten van de oceaan en gaan zelfs terug in de tijd... Dit zou wel eens hun grootste avontuur ooit kunnen zijn. Zal het je lukken om Sonic en zijn vrienden te helpen de gemene Lyric en zijn robotleger te verslaan?

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric - Introductietrailer
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: Engelse trailer (E3 2014)

NZ.description: In Sonic Boom™: Rise of Lyric, Sonic and his friends Tails, Knuckles and Amy encounter an ancient tomb sealed deep within an island, where they come across a powerful snake-like villain named Lyric the last Ancient, who plans to power his army of robots with the Crystals to destroy everything organic and to create a world of twisted metal robots. movies.name: Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric - Launch Trailer
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: Trailer (E3 2014)

PT.name: Sonic Boom™: Rise Of Lyric
PT.description: Em Sonic Boom™: Rise of Lyric, Sonic e seus amigos Tails, Knuckles e Amy encontram uma antiga tumba dentro de uma ilha, lar de um poderoso vilão cobra chamado Lyric, o último ancião, que planeja energizar seu exército de robôs com os Cristais para destruir tudo orgânico e criar um mundo de doentios robôs de metal. O grupo deve deixar suas diferenças de lado e trabalhar como uma equipe para salvar o mundo do plano maligno de Lyric e do seu exército de robôs belicosos! Eles correrão por ruínas antigas, pelas profundezas do oceano e até de volta no tempo... talvez essa seja a maior aventura até agora. Você é capaz de ajudar Sonic e seus amigos a derrotar o maligno Lyric e seu exército de robôs?

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric - Trailer de lançamento
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: Trailer em Inglês (E3 2014)

RU.name: Sonic Boom™: Rise Of Lyric
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В игре Sonic Boom™: Rise of Lyric Соник и его друзья Тейлс, Наклс и Эми обнаруживают в глубине таинственного острова древний запечатанный склеп и сталкиваются с могущественным злодеем - змеем Лириком Древним, который с помощью кристаллов собирается усилить свою армию роботов и уничтожить все живое. Друзьям предстоит забыть о своих разногласиях и действовать единой командой, чтобы спасти мир от Лирика и его механических монстров! Наши герои побывают и на древних развалинах, и в глубинах океана - и даже в прошлом! Это будет их самое грандиозное приключение на сегодняшний день! Сумеете ли вы помочь Сонику и его товарищам победить злодея Лирика и его армию роботов?

movies.name: Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric - трейлер к выходу игры
Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric: трейлер на английском языке (E3 2014)

SI.name: Sonic Boom™: Rise Of Lyric
SI.description: In Sonic Boom™: Rise of Lyric, Sonic and his friends Tails, Knuckles and Amy encounter an ancient tomb sealed deep within an island, where they come across a powerful snake-like villain named Lyric the last Ancient, who plans to power his army of robots with the Crystals to destroy everything organic and to create a world of twisted metal robots. The group must put aside their differences and work together as a team to save the world from Lyric’s evil plan and his army of war mongering robots! They will race across ancient ruins, the depths of the ocean and even back in time... This may be their biggest adventure yet. Do you have what it takes to help Sonic and friends defeat the evil Lyric and his robot army?

They will race across ancient ruins, the depths of the ocean and even back in time... This may be their biggest adventure yet.
